name: my-script-injector
description: Used to add custom script to a page.

inlineScript.description: The collection of scripting statements that will be inserted inline into script tags

async.description: specifies that the script is executed asynchronously

defer.description: Specifies that the script is executed when the page has finished parsing

crossorigin.description: Normal script elements pass minimal information to the window.onerror for scripts which do not pass the standard CORS checks. To allow error logging for sites which use a separate domain for static media, use this attribute
